name: addictedtocoffee.com.au
homepage_content: Addicted to Coffee | Mobile Coffee Vans for Events Skip to content Addicted to Coffee The mobile coffee business with a passion for what we do, making quality coffee at every event we go to. Learn More Coffee for any Event Addicted to Coffee supplies high quality fixed and mobile coffee services throughout the Hunter Valley region and at events throughout NSW, and even as far away as QLD and VIC. We provide professional, fresh, quality espresso coffee onsite at our permanent van location and from our mobile cafes at sporting and special events. We also supply a coffee cart service at recurring annual events such as the Bathurst 1000, AgQuip and one-off events like the recent Commonwealth Games in 2018. Addicted to Coffee is the finest professional mobile cafe service. Contact Us today to see how we can fulfil your coffee needs. Mobile Coffee Trailers & Vans Give your guests a full-bodied experience with our quality mobile coffee van and fresh espresso service for events. Let our travelling coffee cart and professional, friendly baristas create the perfect barista coffee for your next corporate event or private function. Our coffee van hire includes speciality coffee, professional mobile baristas along with coffee machine hire and all equipment. Simply tell us how many cups you would like us to brew, and we will take care of the rest. Our professional baristas will keep your guests caffeinated with a selection of hot coffee, iced lattes, hot chocolate, Chai and a selection of teas. To accompany your event coffee cart, we also offer a range of delicious sweet treats and snacks including muffins, biscuits, toasties and healthy bliss balls. Events Addicted to Coffee serves amazing coffee at events throughout NSW and beyond. Whether its a local soccer match or a large stadium event we can cater for your crowd supplying premium barista-made coffee with excellent service. Our mobile coffee trailers and van are fully-equipped to make a high-volume of take-away coffees. We also serve other hot and cold drinks and a range of delicious snacks. Book our quality mobile cafe for rural events, field days, sporting events, corporate events, school fetes & fairs. Based in the Hunter Valley, our mobile coffee trailer with expertly-trained baristas can be booked for small to large scale public, corporate, community and private events throughout NSW and virtually anywhere on the east coast. We are happy to travel long distances! Contact Get in touch with us to book Addicted to Coffee for your next event. Mobile: 0433 423 523 Email: addictedtocoffee@bigpond.com Gallery Check out some recent pictures of us on the job! Testimonials Thanks to Shane for short notice for supplying the coffee van at veolia singleton today greatly appreciated. The punters were stoked As most of them stop every day on the golden highway for there morning fix and were surprised the van was there. Cheers good job guys Gary Blissett The guys at the food and wine festival Gold Coast are top blokes, the coffee is great, highly suggest dropping by. Brett Ward Just an all round good bloke, with even better coffee Jesse Wilkinson A lovely find at the Food and Wine Festival before going to the Games! Jade Bridge A great team and wonderful family business. Best coffee and toasties around and would recommend to all. You guys saved the day today for our sports carnival! Just what we all needed. Rebecca Croese ABSOLUTE LEGEND. Saved the day with not only the best hot chocolate and service after groovin the moo but a top class Ã¼ber ride to our hotel. Daniel Skehan Best tasting coffee around. Customer service top class Dwayne Finch Contact Us For more information on what we do or just to have a chat give us a call. Phone: 0433 423 523 Page load link Go to Top

name: ballinabyronislanderresortconferencecentre.com.au
homepage_content: Home - Ballina Byron Islander Resort Unwind & Recharge in Northern NSW Book direct & save Arrival Nov 21, 2025 Departure Nov 23, 2025 Guests Guests 1 Check dates Ballina Byron Islander Resort RELAX, DINE, EVENTS Relax in spacious surroundings with lush tropical gardens just minutes from the coast Welcome to Ballina Byron Islander Resort & Conference Centre, your ideal coastal retreat in Ballina. Whether youâ€™re here for a weekend escape, a family holiday, or a business event, our resort offers the perfect mix of comfort, convenience, and warm hospitality. Free Wifi Functions Pool Gardens Restaurant Wine Bar Book Stay Your Way Choose from a variety of spacious, ground-level rooms-each thoughtfully appointed for relaxation and ease. Whether youâ€™re traveling solo, with family, or in a group, we have accommodation to suit your style: Standard, Executive & Premium Rooms Pet Friendly & Accessible Options Interconnecting Family Suites Book Direct for the Best Rates + Complimentary Continental Breakfast More Dine Poolside at Tavola Restaurant Bar Enjoy a relaxed dining experience with seasonal dishes made from local ingredients. Whether youâ€™re enjoying breakfast, a sunset dinner, or drinks by the pool, The Tavola is the perfect place to unwind. Open to guests and the public | Room service available More Celebrates Lifeâ€™s Special Moments From intimate anniversary dinners to milestone birthdays, corporate conferences to weddings, our flexible event spaces are ideal for any occasion. With seating for up to 90 guests and cocktail party with 120 guests, full catering options, and tranquil surroundings, weâ€™ll help you create memorable experiences tailored to your needs. Ask us about custom event packages, dÃ©cor options, and exclusive group rates. More Rooms Select from our room types below, and curate your perfect stay. Whether youâ€™re exploring the region, staying with us for work or an event, a romantic getaway, or simply recharging, youâ€™ll discover everything you need at Ballina Byron Islander Resort. Premium Rooms Contemporary and comfortable, our premium rooms overlook the salt water lagoon pool in a tranquil corner of the property. Enjoy late check-out, and other extra inclusions. View Executive Rooms Spacious and modern, our executive rooms are situated in the back of the property overlooking lush tropical gardens with quiet and tranquility in mind. Disabled options available. View Family Rooms Interconnected twin room options accommodate families of up to 6, with space for everyone. Views of the lagoon pool or tropical gardens and easy access to guest facilities. View Pet Friendly Rooms We have a limited number of dog friendly rooms available, so that you can bring your furry family member along with you on your Ballina stay. View Accessible Rooms Ground floor accommodation including bathrooms fitted with disabled assistance aids, and undercover outside seating areas. View Spa Rooms Whether you want to add a touch of romance or just want to treat yourself, our spa rooms offer something extra special to your stay. View Join our mailing list for updates Explore THE REGION From iconic beaches and lush hinterlands to cultural gems and culinary delights, the best of Northern NSW is at your doorstep. Discover why Ballina is one of Australiaâ€™s most loved coastal destinations. The Big Prawn (2 mins) Ballina Naval & Maritime Museum (10 mins) Byron Bay Wildlife Sanctuary (12 mins) Shelly Beach & Lighthouse Lookout (13 mins) Ballina Golf & Sports Club (13 mins) Ballina Byron Gateway Airport (14 mins) Killen Falls (16 mins) Lennox Head (17 mins) Cape Byron Lighthouse & Byron Bay (26 mins) Crystal Castle & Shambhala Gardens (32 mins) Cabarita Beach (46 mins) More Facilities Comfort meets convenience with a thoughtful range of onsite facilities designed to make your stay effortless. Relax by the pool, host a work function or event, or unwind in our spa. Everything is here to help you feel at home. Lagoon Pool & Spa Take a refreshing dip in the saltwater lagoon-style pool or unwind in the spa surrounded by tropical gardens. More Wine & Dine Enjoy relaxed dining at our onsite restaurant and bar, serving fresh, locally inspired meals and your favourite drinks in a welcoming setting. More Weddings & Events From intimate weddings to special events, our versatile function spaces provide the perfect backdrop for memorable occasions. More Conferences & Meetings Host successful conferences and meetings with ease in our fully equipped event spaces, complete with flexible layouts, catering options, and onsite accommodation. More Catering On-site catering is available for events in our function spaces, for everything from low-key casual gatherings, to birthday and other celebrations, or work functions, and even weddings! More Special Offers Corporate packages, group booking discounts, best stay rates and website only exclusive booking offers. View What's On View local events coming up, and make the most of your stay. More Such a pleasant overnight stay, staff were fantastic going beyond expectations to ensure our stay was fantastic. Restaurant was a delight, excellent menu (very reasonable prices) with breakfast included. Highly recommend the Ballina Byron islander resort. Peter via Google Reviews After making a last minute booking and arriving after hours, we were so grateful to have found this hotel! It was easy to locate, and the room was immaculate, well-appointed, quiet, and very comfortable. Trudy at reception was wonderfully helpful, and thanks to Lisa and staff, breakfast was amazing! This venue has turned out to be the highlight of our dash to an interstate sporting event. Rachel via Google Reviews Very clean, neat, tidy and accommodating staff. I will be staying here again next time I visit Ballina. Staff are all very friendly and we had a nice quiet room. Thoroughly enjoyed the accommodation provided here. The food was excellent, so much so, we returned again on our 2nd night. Jason is an excellent chef. LIsaCClare via Google Reviews Absolutely loved staying here! Great quaint atmosphere, lovely reception and hospitality ~ the food was AMAZING. Pet friendly too, which is really valued. Thank you for a great stay! Syl via Google Reviews Great value rooms for a short stay, staff were lovely and the room was clean. Great restaurant and a nice pool for the kids to cool off in. Recommend the place for a tired traveller, and definitely try the restaurant or room service, the food is delicious. Carmen Cuschieri via Google Reviews A big thank you to the wonderful staff at the Balllina Byron Islander Resort My husband and I had a great stay The room was comfortable and air-conditioned we absolutely loved the food The Chef is fantastic best bruchetta ever !!! and the other food we ate soo yummy ðŸ˜‹ thanks for making my birthday so special Canâ€™t wait till our return. Gray - Booking.com The ability to park outside the door was a bonus. The menu was adequate, and the wine list was fairly short but more than adequate including having some local â€˜Big Riverâ€™ wineries. The chef (Jason) made a point of checking with us on his cooking efforts- we gave him a very big â€˜well doneâ€™ Leanne - Booking.com The pool was amazing & gardens and grounds are well maintained. Stayed in room with a garden view very quiet. Martin - Booking.com It was good to have a breakfast/dining room. Not many places these days cater for breakfast and we donâ€™t like going down the street to find a place to eat. Our room was nicely appointed and our bed comfortable. Booking.com user Dine close to home at Ballina Byron Islander Resor Enjoy the lush gardens and spacious lawn areas at Step inside Crawford House Museum, a beautifully p Host unforgettable events in our versatile spaces Get ready for a night of glitz and glamour at the Unwind under the stars at Ballina Byron Islander R Perched high above the Richmond River, Pat Morton Strike up some fun at @ballinabowl ðŸŽ³ With state-of Dive into relaxation and flavour at Ballina Byron Get ready to groove at the Bangalow Music Festival Tee off at @BallinaGolf for a day of championship Immerse yourself in country charm at @summerland_f Enjoy a memorable meal without stepping foot off-s Immerse yourself in a world of words at @byronwrit Chase waterfalls and discover one of the regionâ€™s Get ready for a reel adventure at @EvansFishingCla Wake up to ocean breezes and brunch with a view at Take in the full view of your next escape from abo Follow Follow Find Us 1 Ronan Pl, West Ballina NSW 2478 Get in touch Tel: (02) 6686 8866 Reception: info@bbir.com.au Events & Functions: events@bbir.com.au FAQs Where is Ballina Byron Islander Resort located? Weâ€™re located at 1 Ronan Place, West Ballina NSW 2478, surrounded by lush tropical gardens and just minutes from Ballinaâ€™s beaches, shops, and restaurants. Byron Bay is a 25-minute drive north. What types of rooms do you offer? Choose from Standard, Executive, Premium, Spa, Family, Accessible, and Pet-Friendly rooms â€” all ground level and designed for comfort and relaxation. Are pets and accessibility needs accommodated? Yes â€” we have dog-friendly rooms and accessible rooms fitted with mobility aids, step-free access, and undercover outdoor seating. Does my booking include breakfast? When you book direct on our website, youâ€™ll receive our best available rate plus a complimentary continental breakfast each morning. What facilities are available for guests? Guests enjoy a salt-water lagoon pool and spa, onsite restaurant and wine bar, tropical gardens, free Wi-Fi, and complimentary parking right outside their room. Does the resort have a restaurant or bar? Yes â€” Tavola Restaurant & Bar offers relaxed poolside dining with seasonal dishes made from local ingredients. Itâ€™s open to guests and the public for breakfast and dinner, with room service available. Is parking available onsite? Yes â€” free onsite parking is available directly outside most rooms, including spaces suitable for larger vehicles. Is Wi-Fi free for guests? Yes â€” unlimited complimentary Wi-Fi is provided throughout the resort for all guests. Can I host a function or event at the resort? Absolutely. Our Conference Centre and event spaces cater for up to 90 seated or 120 cocktail-style guests, ideal for weddings, meetings, and special celebrations. Do you provide catering for events? Yes â€” our onsite team offers full catering for conferences, weddings, and private functions, with menus tailored to your event. How far is the resort from Ballina Byron Gateway Airport? Weâ€™re about 14 minutes by car from Ballina Byron Gateway Airport, making arrivals and departures quick and easy. What are some popular nearby attractions? Highlights include The Big Prawn (2 min), Ballina Naval & Maritime Museum (10 min), Shelly Beach & Lighthouse Lookout (13 min), Lennox Head (17 min), and Cape Byron Lighthouse (26 min) â€” all easy day trips. Ã— Sign up and get $10 off your first booking*

Does the resort have a restaurant or bar? Yes â€” Tavola Restaurant & Bar offers relaxed poolside dining with seasonal dishes made from local ingredients. Itâ€™s open to guests and the public for breakfast and dinner, with room service available. Is parking available onsite? Yes â€” free onsite parking is available directly outside most rooms, including spaces suitable for larger vehicles. Is Wi-Fi free for guests? Yes â€” unlimited complimentary Wi-Fi is provided throughout the resort for all guests. Can I host a function or event at the resort? Absolutely. Our Conference Centre and event spaces cater for up to 90 seated or 120 cocktail-style guests, ideal for weddings, meetings, and special celebrations. Do you provide catering for events? Yes â€” our onsite team offers full catering for conferences, weddings, and private functions, with menus tailored to your event. How far is the resort from Ballina Byron Gateway Airport? Weâ€™re about 14 minutes by car from Ballina Byron Gateway Airport, making arrivals and departures quick and easy. What are some popular nearby attractions? Highlights include The Big Prawn (2 min), Ballina Naval & Maritime Museum (10 min), Shelly Beach & Lighthouse Lookout (13 min), Lennox Head (17 min), and Cape Byron Lighthouse (26 min) â€” all easy day trips.
